document.full_text: egypt intends to open its border with gaza permanently to ease life for palestinians under an israeli blockade but the mechanics of such a step are still being worked out, the foreign ministry said on sunday.
document.title: egypt says intends to open gaza border permanently
lines_and_colors: egypt intends to open its border with gaza permanently to ease life for palestinians under an israeli blockade but the mechanics of such a step are still being worked out, the foreign ministry said on sunday.
